org.mantisbt.connect.text
Interface ICustomFieldFormat

All Known Implementing Classes:
CheckboxCustomFieldFormat, CustomFieldFormat, DateCustomFieldFormat, ListCustomFieldFormat, StringCustomFieldFormat
public interface ICustomFieldFormat

Objects of this type can be used to transfer values from Mantis-Format to Java-Format and vice-versa.

Author:
Peter Lanser, planser@users.sourceforge.net

Method Summary
 java.lang.String format(java.lang.Object object)
           Formats a Java-Object into the appropriate string representation for Mantis.
 java.lang.Object parse(java.lang.String string)
           Parses a value which comes in Mantis-Format and transforms it into an appropriate Java-Object.
 

Method Detail

parse

java.lang.Object parse(java.lang.String string)
                       throws CustomFieldFormatException

Parses a value which comes in Mantis-Format and transforms it into an appropriate Java-Object.

Throws:
CustomFieldFormatException - This exception is thrown if an error occurres while the transformation.

format

java.lang.String format(java.lang.Object object)
                        throws CustomFieldFormatException

Formats a Java-Object into the appropriate string representation for Mantis.

Throws:
CustomFieldFormatException - This exception is thrown if the value doesn't fulfill certain restrictions (e.g. minimum length, maximum length, allowed values etc.). It depends on the concrete type which restrictions are checked.
